summary: "The Masked Singer" is an American TV show where celebrities sing while dressed in full costumes and masks. Hosted by Nick Cannon, the show features panelists who try to guess the singers' identities based on clues. The audience and judges vote for their favorite, and the least popular singer is eliminated, revealing their identity. The show has been popular, with high ratings and several spin-offs. It's based on a South Korean series, and the costumes, designed by Marina Toybina, have won awards. The show has been renewed through season twelve.
title: The Masked Singer (American TV series)
